messages.title: A strong voice for Cities of London & Westminster
messages.content: Fighting for top services - since 2010 I have backed transport upgrades and secured investment in our hospitals and a new school.

messages.title: Competent leadership or Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: On 7th May, your vote will deliver...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Backed transport upgrades and secured investment in hospitals and a new school since 2010.
Against envy-driven policies like a mansion tax and the negative rhetoric so damaging to the UK's reputation.
Speaking for the voiceless on issues like homelessness and low pay.

issues.economy: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Benefits cap 'leads more into work'. Tax cuts for workers and savers. You’re getting £10 off a tank with the Tories.
issues.governance: Competent leadership with deficit down, income tax cut, more jobs, and new businesses.

housing.content: Against envy-driven policies like a mansion tax.

leaflet.personalStatement: Fighting for top services - since 2010 I have backed transport upgrades and secured investment in our hospitals and a new school.

endorsements.endorgence: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt
Bosses queue up to warn; Miliband will bankrupt Britain

quotes.text: Job total hits record high while wages surge

images.caption: MARK FIELD - A strong voice for Cities of London & Westminster

leaflet.additionalNotes: Election Communication - London Central, Cities of London And Westminster. Promoted by MARK NICHOLAS DOWN TURNER, on behalf of MARK FIELD. Printed by St Ives plc.
